Jumbotron.desc: Join Amani, tap into large-scale project opportunities, and gain the working capital to keep your operations smooth and efficient.

WhyAmani.title: Why Choose Amani?
WhyAmani.cardDesc1: Rest assured, your payments are secure with Amani.
WhyAmani.cardDesc2: Buy now, pay later with safe, sharia-compliant financing options.
WhyAmani.cardDesc3: Dive into various large-scale projects with Amani’s easy-to-use bidding platform and compete to win.

step1.title: Register your Company
step1.desc: Start easily by filling out the form on the Amani platform.

step2.title: Verification by Amani
step2.desc: Amani will verify your registration data.

step3.title: Select Projects and Join the Bidding
step3.desc: Select interested projects and participate in the bidding process.

step4.title: Win and Start Your Work
step4.desc: Win the bid and get started on your project immediately.

step5.title: Use Material Financing
step5.desc: Enjoy the material financing Amani provides to keep your project running smoothly

step6.title: Invoice and Get Paid
step6.desc: Submit your invoice for completed work and receive payment, with the cost of materials used already subtracted.

PartnershipReq.title: Partnership Requirements
PartnershipReq.cardDesc1: It must be a tax-registered business entity.
PartnershipReq.cardDesc2: The company must have been operational for over 2 years.
PartnershipReq.cardDesc3: Must be able to provide a project portfolio.
PartnershipReq.cardDesc4: Must have a construction business permit.

Closing.line2: Projects with Amani work seamlessly and stress-free.
Closing.line3: We’ve got your back all the way!

Form.title: Get access to large-scale projects now!
